unsubscribeServerFromChannel

public static Server unsubscribeServerFromChannel(Server server,
                                                  Channel channel)
Unsubscribe given server from the given channel. If you use this method, YOU BETTER KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING!!! (Use the version that takes a user as well if you're unsure. better safe than sorry).

Parameters:
server - server to be unsubscribed
channel - the channel to unsubscribe from
Returns:
the modified server if there were any changes modifications made to the Server during the call. Make sure the caller uses the returned server.

description of server information as well as a list of relevant packages
